name: NSLock
desc: An object that coordinates the operation of multiple threads of execution within the same application.

items.name: func lock(before: Date) -> Bool
items.desc: Attempts to acquire a lock before a given time and returns a Boolean value indicating whether the attempt was successful.

items.name: func `try`() -> Bool
items.desc: Attempts to acquire a lock and immediately returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the attempt was successful.

items.name: var name: String?
items.desc: The name associated with the receiver.
